T15TD4329E:103a-1: n'i ti sh'astra pradzny'a danda n'a ma /
T15TD4329E:103b-0: lugs kyi bstan bcos shes rab sdong @103b bu zhes bya ba //
T15TD4329E:103b-1: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T15TD4329E:103b-2: mi srun skye bo gdul bar bya //
T15TD4329E:103b-3: yon tan can ni bkur par bya //
T15TD4329E:103b-4: drang po'i spyod pas dkor mdzod dgang //
T15TD4329E:103b-5: rang gi yul 'khor bskyang bar bya //
T15TD4329E:103b-6: bdag gi gsang dang gzhan gyi gsang //
T15TD4329E:103b-7: rang gi bu gces bzhin bsrungs nas //
T15TD4329E:103b-8: sa rnams la ni snyoms gyur ba'i //
T15TD4329E:103b-9: mi ni gces pa rab gces 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:103b-10: chung ma ngan dang mdza' bo ngan //
T15TD4329E:103b-11: rgyal po ngan dang nye du dan //
T15TD4329E:103b-12: khyim mtshes ngan dang yul ngan rnams //
T15TD4329E:103b-13: thag ring du ni spang bar bya //
T15TD4329E:103b-14: grogs po nor dad che ba spang //
T15TD4329E:103b-15: chung ma log g-yem dad che spang //
T15TD4329E:103b-16: bkur dka' so mi mkhas pa yi //
T15TD4329E:103b-17: de lta bu yi sman pa spang //
T15TD4329E:103b-18: bye brag phyed pa'i blo ldan yang //
T15TD4329E:103b-19: bya ba gros kyis bsgrub par bya //
T15TD4329E:103b-21: ma 'grub na yang mdzes pa yin //
T15TD4329E:103b-22: brtan zhing 'jam la tshig nyung gang yin pa //
T15TD4329E:103b-23: de la shin tu shin tu bag bya ste //
T15TD4329E:103b-24: nyi ma sprin bug nang nas byung ba yi //
T15TD4329E:103b-25: 'od zer shin tu tsha bar gyur pa bzhin //
T15TD4329E:103b-26: brtan rnams sdug bsngal myong gyur kyang //
T15TD4329E:103b-27: yid ni gdung bar mi byed de //
T15TD4329E:103b-28: zla ba sgra gcan khar zhugs nas //
T15TD4329E:103b-30: kun dga' ra ba'i phreng rgyud ltar //
T15TD4329E:103b-31: me tog rgyas pa btu bya yi //
T15TD4329E:103b-32: ji ltar sol ba mkhan bzhin du //
T15TD4329E:103b-33: rtsa nas gcad par mi bya'o //
T15TD4329E:103b-34: gsug dang rgyal po'i bka' drin dang //
T15TD4329E:103b-35: smad 'tshong gla dang legs brjod dang //
T15TD4329E:103b-36: gru yi gla dang gnas kyi skal //
T15TD4329E:103b-37: 'di nyid du ni blang bya ste //
T15TD4329E:103b-38: drug po yun ring thob mi 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:103b-39: rig sngags log par shes pa dug / nad la btang snyoms byas pa dug / rgan pos gzhon nu bsten pa dug / dbul po nyin par nyal ba dug / dam pa mang po khas 'ches mi byed la //
T15TD4329E:103b-40: gal te dka' bas khas ni blangs gyur na //
T15TD4329E:103b-41: rdo la ri mo bris pa lta bur ni //
T15TD4329E:103b-42: shi yang gzhan du byed par mi 'gyur ro //
T15TD4329E:103b-43: dus su dgra dang 'jum par bya //
T15TD4329E:103b-44: dus su bshes dang 'thab par bya //
T15TD4329E:103b-45: bya dang mi bya'i tshod shes pas //
T15TD4329E:103b-46: mkhas pas dus ni 'da' bar bya //
T15TD4329E:103b-47: kha yi nyes pas phung 'gyur te //
T15TD4329E:103b-48: ne tso ri skegs ti ti ra //
T15TD4329E:103b-49: mi smra chu skyar mis mi 'dzin //
T15TD4329E:103b-50: thams cad 'grub byed mi smra yin //
T15TD4329E:103b-51: chas bzhag bstar bas dgra bo gdul //
T15TD4329E:104a-0: gos ngan gyis ni chung ma @104a * //
T15TD4329E:104a-2: smyung ba byas pas nad rnams gdul //
T15TD4329E:104a-3: goms pa yis ni ma rig gdul //
T15TD4329E:104a-4: rang gi spyod pa sba bar bya //
T15TD4329E:104a-5: 'dam gyi nang du lus bcug pa'i //
T15TD4329E:104a-6: gal te myu gus ma bos na //
T15TD4329E:104a-7: padma'i rtsa ba su yis rnyed //
T15TD4329E:104a-8: gal te mngon sum gyur kyang ni //
T15TD4329E:104a-9: mi srid dngos po smra mi bya //
T15TD4329E:104a-10: ri mo la gnas rma bya yis //
T15TD4329E:104a-11: ji ltar nor bu za bar byed //
T15TD4329E:104a-12: gang zhig yid la gnod byed 'dod //
T15TD4329E:104a-13: de la rtag tu snyan tshig brjod //
T15TD4329E:104a-14: rngon pa ri dags gsod mthong tshe //
T15TD4329E:104a-15: yid 'ong glu snyan len pa bzhin //
T15TD4329E:104a-16: bsam pa gang dang gang gis ni //
T15TD4329E:104a-17: mi rnams yid ni yang dag sbyor //
T15TD4329E:104a-18: des na de yi dbang du 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:104a-19: sna tshogs nor bu ji bzhin no //
T15TD4329E:104a-20: gzhan gyi khu tshur 'tsho ba bla //
T15TD4329E:104a-21: nags na shing shun gyon pa bla //
T15TD4329E:104a-22: mi rnams shi bar gyur kyang bla //
T15TD4329E:104a-23: nyin re bzhin du brnyas thabs min //
T15TD4329E:104a-24: ma brnyas mi yi rtsa ba yin //
T15TD4329E:104a-25: brnyas pa'i nor gyis ci zhig bya //
T15TD4329E:104a-26: nga rgyal dregs pas rab bcom pa'i //
T15TD4329E:104a-27: nor dang srog gis ci zhig bya //
T15TD4329E:104a-28: bya ba mi lcogs rtsom par byed pa dang //
T15TD4329E:104a-29: tshogs dang 'khon zhing stobs ldan dag la rgol //
T15TD4329E:104a-30: bud med la ni yid brtan byed pa ste //
T15TD4329E:104a-31: 'chi bdag bzhi po sgo yi drung na sdod //
T15TD4329E:104a-32: rgyal po ngan pa yod ma mthong //
T15TD4329E:104a-33: mdza' bo g-yon can yod ma mthong //
T15TD4329E:104a-34: 'dod ldan chung ma yod ma mthong //
T15TD4329E:104a-35: skye bo sdig can yod ma mthong //
T15TD4329E:104a-36: gang zhig kun du bgrod bya yod pa de //
T15TD4329E:104a-37: rang yul chags pas brlag par ci phyir byed //
T15TD4329E:104a-38: skye bo ngan pa bdag gi khron pa ni //
T15TD4329E:104a-39: 'di yin zer zhing ba tshva can chu 'thung //
T15TD4329E:104a-40: skye bo blo dpangs mtho ba la //
T15TD4329E:104a-41: 'di na bde skyid gnyis yod de //
T15TD4329E:104a-43: 'byor pa shin tu rgya che ba'o //
T15TD4329E:104a-44: dpal ni rgyab kyis phyogs gyur cing //
T15TD4329E:104a-45: rtsol ba don med nyid gyur ba'o //
T15TD4329E:104a-46: dam pa dbul por gyur pa las //
T15TD4329E:104a-47: nags las gzhan du bde ba med //
T15TD4329E:104a-48: dam pa'i 'gro ba gnyis yin te //
T15TD4329E:104a-49: me tog dag gi mgo lcogs bzhin //
T15TD4329E:104a-50: 'jig rten kun gyis spyir bkur ba'am //
T15TD4329E:104a-51: nags nyid du ni dengs par bya //
T15TD4329E:104a-52: rang gis skad cig 'jig pa yi //
T15TD4329E:104a-53: tshe yi snying po 'di yin te /
T15TD4329E:104a-54: mdza' dang mkhas dang shed ma bye //
T15TD4329E:104a-55: lhan cig bag yangs gnas pa'o //
T15TD4329E:104a-57: spyad na mig sman zad 'gyur ltar //
T15TD4329E:104b-1: de nyid kho na mkhas pa yin //
T15TD4329E:104b-2: grogs 'khar dang ni sbrang rtsi dang //
T15TD4329E:104b-3: zla ba tshes pa yar gyi ngo //
T15TD4329E:104b-4: rgyal bo'i nor dang sprang po'i nor //
T15TD4329E:104b-5: cung zad cung zad bsags pas 'phel //
T15TD4329E:104b-6: ha cang sred par mi bya ste //
T15TD4329E:104b-7: sred pa che la nyes pa 'byung //
T15TD4329E:104b-8: ha cang sred pas rmongs byas na //
T15TD4329E:104b-9: ce spyang gzhu mchog gtsug tor bzhin //
T15TD4329E:104b-10: bya ba'i don du rjes su 'brang //
T15TD4329E:104b-11: byas zin pa la brten mi byed //
T15TD4329E:104b-12: blo ngan zho yi rna ba can //
T15TD4329E:104b-13: bsrung bar bya ba khyod kyis bcom //
T15TD4329E:104b-14: rab tu grags pa 'gro mi bya //
T15TD4329E:104b-15: bdag nyid kyis ni mngon sum bya //
T15TD4329E:104b-16: bil ba chu nang lhung ba yis //
T15TD4329E:104b-17: nags tshal stong par gyur la ltos //
T15TD4329E:104b-18: gnad du 'phog pa'i tshig mi brjod //
T15TD4329E:104b-19: shin tu gnod pa'ang brjod mi bya //
T15TD4329E:104b-20: skyes bu dang ni mtshon cha yi //
T15TD4329E:104b-21: pha rol dag ni shes par bya //
T15TD4329E:104b-22: dgra bo'i bu ni snyan par smra na yang //
T15TD4329E:104b-23: mkhas pa yis ni btang snyoms mi bya ste //
T15TD4329E:104b-24: dug lo shin tu mi bzad yin pas na //
T15TD4329E:104b-25: de nyid dus gzhan dag tu gnod pa skyed //
T15TD4329E:104b-26: gang zhig dgra bo dag la yang //
T15TD4329E:104b-27: g-yo med sems kyis phan byed pa //
T15TD4329E:104b-28: de la dgra bo thams cad kyang //
T15TD4329E:104b-29: thal mo sbyor ba nyid du byed //
T15TD4329E:104b-30: dgra bo zil gnon 'dod pa yis //
T15TD4329E:104b-31: bdag nyid yon tan gyis bstod kyi //
T15TD4329E:104b-32: gnod sems ngan pas ci zhig bya //
T15TD4329E:104b-33: des ni bdag gnod gra la min //
T15TD4329E:104b-34: mi srun skye bo zhi bas min / de dang 'tsham pa'i rtsub bas bsten //
T15TD4329E:104b-35: bu ni mi bsgrungs pa dag la //
T15TD4329E:104b-36: phan 'dod pha yis mi bsdigs sam //
T15TD4329E:104b-37: ji sred lam ni mthong ba dang //
T15TD4329E:104b-38: ji srid rkang pa brtan pa dang //
T15TD4329E:104b-39: ji srid shes rab ma nyams pa //
T15TD4329E:104b-40: de srid rang gi phan pa gyis //
T15TD4329E:104b-41: rnam pa kun du rang phan spyad bya yi //
T15TD4329E:104b-42: 'gro mang nang du gnas pas ci zhig bya //
T15TD4329E:104b-43: skye bo thams cad yongs su mgu 'gyur ba //
T15TD4329E:104b-44: de 'dra'i thabs ni gang yang yod ma yin //
T15TD4329E:104b-45: gzhan las tshol zhing zas zhim 'dod //
T15TD4329E:104b-46: slong mos 'tsho zhing khengs pa che //
T15TD4329E:104b-47: bstan bcos shes med rtsod par 'dod //
T15TD4329E:104b-48: khyod kyi de gsum bzhad gad rgyu //
T15TD4329E:104b-49: nags bsregs pa yi me la ni //
T15TD4329E:104b-50: rlung gis grogs su 'gyur ba yin //
T15TD4329E:104b-51: de nyid mar me 'jig byed pas //
T15TD4329E:104b-52: nyam chung ba la bshes yod min //
T15TD4329E:104b-53: gzhan la gnod pa ma byas dang //
T15TD4329E:104b-54: dman la 'dud pa ma byas shing //
T15TD4329E:104b-55: dam pa'i lam ni ma spangs gang //
T15TD4329E:105a-2: nad kyi 'jigs pa ma byung zhing //
T15TD4329E:105a-3: dam pa dag dang 'grogs par brtson //
T15TD4329E:105a-4: dman pa'i tshig ni ma smras pa'i //
T15TD4329E:105a-5: nyin gcig lo brgya bas mchog yin //
T15TD4329E:105a-6: dman pas gang tshe nor ni cung zad rnyed //
T15TD4329E:105a-7: 'gro ba thams cad brnyas pa'i nga rgyal ldan //
T15TD4329E:105a-8: dam pa nor gyi 'byor pa thob gyur kyang ;
T15TD4329E:105a-9: / s'a lu smin pa lta bur shin tu 'dud //
T15TD4329E:105a-10: rigs rus dma' ba'i sems can dag / nor ram rig pa rnyed gyur na //
T15TD4329E:105a-11: 'gro ba kun la rtsva snyam sems //
T15TD4329E:105a-12: bags pa sngon po'i wa bzhin no //
T15TD4329E:105a-13: nor ram rig par ldan gyur na //
T15TD4329E:105a-14: dman pa rnams ni dregs par 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:105a-15: go 'phang gnyis pa de dag gis //
T15TD4329E:105a-16: mkhas pa shin tu dul bar 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:105a-17: bogs med tshong dang 'khor ldan dag la 'tsho //
T15TD4329E:105a-18: slong zhing 'gying la nor med 'dod la dga' //
T15TD4329E:105a-19: bud med bzhon la tshig rtsub smra ba ste //
T15TD4329E:105a-20: skyes bu log par spyod pa de lnga'o //
T15TD4329E:105a-21: rma bya so ga'i tsha bas gdungs gyur kyang //
T15TD4329E:105a-22: mkha' dkyil char gyi rgyun la re bla yis /
T15TD4329E:105a-23: rdzing bu rnyog pa can gyi chu ngan la //
T15TD4329E:105a-24: dregs pas bstod pa'i mgrin pa ma gdud cig //
T15TD4329E:105a-25: ti ti ra ni zil pa yi //
T15TD4329E:105a-26: thigs pas srog ni 'dzin byed kyang //
T15TD4329E:105a-27: bslang na gtugs pa'i 'jigs pa yis //
T15TD4329E:105a-28: brgya byin la yang mi slong ngo //
T15TD4329E:105a-29: de nyid shes na slob dpon ci //
T15TD4329E:105a-30: nad sos sman pa ga la dgos //
T15TD4329E:105a-31: chu bo brgal na gru pas ci //
T15TD4329E:105a-32: chags bral byad mas ci zhig bya //
T15TD4329E:105a-33: ngan pa ji srid nyam chung ba //
T15TD4329E:105a-34: de srid bar du rang bzhin bzang //
T15TD4329E:105a-35: ston ka yi ni chu bo'i chu //
T15TD4329E:105a-36: skye bo kun gyis bgrod pa bla //
T15TD4329E:105a-37: gang du byi bas mdzod pa byed //
T15TD4329E:105a-38: byi las mar ni bsrung ba dang //
T15TD4329E:105a-39: khva yis phyag tshang byed pa yi //
T15TD4329E:105a-40: dngos de la ni smos ci dgos //
T15TD4329E:105a-41: gang na zhal ta byed pa mang //
T15TD4329E:105a-42: thams cad mkhas par nga rgyal che //
T15TD4329E:105a-43: kun kyang gtso bo byed 'dod pa //
T15TD4329E:105a-45: nyin par 'khrig dang nyin nyal dang //
T15TD4329E:105a-46: chang gsar zho ni gzhon nu 'thung //
T15TD4329E:105a-47: sha skam bud med rgan nyal te //
T15TD4329E:105a-49: gang zhig khro na'ang 'jigs med la //
T15TD4329E:105a-50: dga' na'ang phan 'dogs mi nus pa //
T15TD4329E:105a-51: tshar gcod bsdu ba med 'gyur ba'i //
T15TD4329E:105a-52: de khros pas ni ci byar yod //
T15TD4329E:105a-53: nad dang phangs dus byung ba dang //
T15TD4329E:105a-54: mu ge'i tshe dang dgras 'jigs dang //
T15TD4329E:105a-55: rgyal po'i sgo dang gshin rje'i gnas //
T15TD4329E:105b-0: de rnams @105b kun gyi gnyen por 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:105b-1: dgos pa'i don du 'jig rten sgrub //
T15TD4329E:105b-2: dam pa'i don du de dag min //
T15TD4329E:105b-4: ba ni ring du spang ba bzhin //
T15TD4329E:105b-5: sdug pa dang bral rang mis brnyas pa dang //
T15TD4329E:105b-6: bu 'on mang zhing dan pa dag la brten //
T15TD4329E:105b-7: dbul por mthong nas mdza' bos spangs pa ste //
T15TD4329E:105b-8: me ma yin pas lus sreg de lnga'o //
T15TD4329E:105b-9: mi mthun chung du 'phel ba la //
T15TD4329E:105b-10: mi gang zhi bar mi byed pa //
T15TD4329E:105b-11: sbrang rtsi'i thigs pa 'dzag pa dang //
T15TD4329E:105b-13: gang zhig rigs ldan de bzhin brten pa dang //
T15TD4329E:105b-14: dam pa phangs kyang yon tan gtong mi byed //
T15TD4329E:105b-15: nyi ma'i rang bzhin tsha bas gdungs kyang ni //
T15TD4329E:105b-16: kha ba grang ba'i rang bzhin gtong mi byed //
T15TD4329E:105b-17: sdig pa zad 'dod bde bar gshegs la dad //
T15TD4329E:105b-18: skal ba zad 'dod skye bo ngan dang bsten //
T15TD4329E:105b-19: rigs rgyud zad 'dod glan zhing lkugs pa skye //
T15TD4329E:105b-20: 'bru rnams zad 'dod pho ba'i me drod skye //
T15TD4329E:105b-21: 'dod pas long bas sdig mi mthong //
T15TD4329E:105b-22: dmus long gis ni gzugs mi mthong //
T15TD4329E:105b-23: dregs pa yis ni skyon mi mthong //
T15TD4329E:105b-24: bdag ltas de nyid mi mthong ngo //
T15TD4329E:105b-25: rgyal po yur chu 'khri shing dang //
T15TD4329E:105b-26: bud med dmus long lnga po ni //
T15TD4329E:105b-27: g-yon can blo yis ji ltar khrid //
T15TD4329E:105b-28: khrid rnams gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:105b-29: bde ba'i rjes la sdug bsngal te //
T15TD4329E:105b-30: sdug bsngal rjes la bde ba yin //
T15TD4329E:105b-31: mi rnams kyi ni bde sdug dag //
T15TD4329E:105b-33: ma mthong ba dag mdun du lhags //
T15TD4329E:105b-34: slar yang ma mthong ba ru song //
T15TD4329E:105b-35: khyod kyi de ci khyod kyang ci //
T15TD4329E:105b-36: de la mya ngan su zhig byed //
T15TD4329E:105b-37: ji lta ji ltar shing dag ni //
T15TD4329E:105b-38: rgya mtsho che la mnyam 'gro ba //
T15TD4329E:105b-39: dba' rlabs kyis ni so sor phye //
T15TD4329E:105b-40: de la mya ngan su zhig byed //
T15TD4329E:105b-41: blo gros che ldan khro bas shugs las rgyal //
T15TD4329E:105b-42: skye bo ngan pa khro bas mod la pham //
T15TD4329E:105b-43: pham pas pham par byas pa'i blo ngan dag //
T15TD4329E:105b-44: blo ldan dag dang lhan cig ci phyir 'gran //
T15TD4329E:105b-45: pha bong 'bad pa chen po yis //
T15TD4329E:105b-46: ri yi rtse mor 'degs par nus //
T15TD4329E:105b-47: cung zad tsam gyis de skur ba //
T15TD4329E:105b-48: rang gi skyon yon de dang mtshungs //
T15TD4329E:105b-49: mi gang bya ba ma yin pa'i //
T15TD4329E:105b-50: bya ba la ni sbyor byed pa //
T15TD4329E:105b-51: des ni nges par phung 'gyur te //
T15TD4329E:105b-53: rang gi phyogs ni yongs spangs nas //
T15TD4329E:105b-54: gzhan gyi phyogs la dga' ba gang //
T15TD4329E:105b-55: de ni nges par brlag 'gyur te //
T15TD4329E:106a-1: po rab dmar ji bzhin no //
T15TD4329E:106a-2: mkha' la skar mkhan dag gis rtsis byas na //
T15TD4329E:106a-3: zla ba dang ni skar ma'i lam rnams shes //
T15TD4329E:106a-4: khyim na mi dang khyim thab log pa dag / sna tshogs spyod pa de ni mthong ma gyur //
T15TD4329E:106a-5: rnyog med chu nang zla tshes snang gyur pa //
T15TD4329E:106a-6: padma'i rtsa ba len par khyod byed gyur //
T15TD4329E:106a-7: dang pa chu dang 'o ma 'byed shes pa'i //
T15TD4329E:106a-8: khyod kyi blo gros de ring gang du song //
T15TD4329E:106a-9: mi gang bya ba chen po gang //
T15TD4329E:106a-10: cung zad byed par 'dod na yang //
T15TD4329E:106a-11: de ni bsgrims nas rab bya ste //
T15TD4329E:106a-12: seng ge'i las gcig yin par bshad //
T15TD4329E:106a-13: ji ltar rgyal srid bskyang ba dang //
T15TD4329E:106a-14: bsdo ba'i dgra rnams 'dul ba dag /'bangs la re ba ma 'jog par //
T15TD4329E:106a-15: zhal bzhugs tshe na smyur te mdzod //
T15TD4329E:106a-16: snying du sdug pa'am gzhan gang zhes //
T15TD4329E:106a-17: sems yang ba dag rtse bar byed //
T15TD4329E:106a-18: spyod pa rgya chen ldan pa dag / sa yi dkyil 'khor thams cad gnyer //
T15TD4329E:106a-19: rtag tu snyan tshig smra ba yi //
T15TD4329E:106a-20: rgyal pos skye dgu brid par sla //
T15TD4329E:106a-21: phan tshig sman dang 'dra ba de //
T15TD4329E:106a-22: nyan pa bas kyang smra ba dkon //
T15TD4329E:106a-23: gal te chos don rtogs pa yis //
T15TD4329E:106a-24: zhal che lam srang skyon na ni //
T15TD4329E:106a-25: 'gro ba blo ldan gcig gyur kyang //
T15TD4329E:106a-26: de las bdag ni rnam par rgyal //
T15TD4329E:106a-27: nor mnyam nus pa mnyam pa dang //
T15TD4329E:106a-28: gnad shes 'bad rtsol che ba yi //
T15TD4329E:106a-30: gang dgras mi phung de yis phung //
T15TD4329E:106a-31: chu yi nang nas me 'bar na //
T15TD4329E:106a-32: me de gang gis zhi bar byed //
T15TD4329E:106a-33: skyob pa las ni 'jigs pa byung //
T15TD4329E:106a-34: 'jigs pa de las su yis srung //
T15TD4329E:106a-35: ma bskul mi snyan dgra ston la //
T15TD4329E:106a-36: bskul nas snyan pa mi sgrogs la //
T15TD4329E:106a-38: de ltar bskul zhing sgra snyan sgrogs //
T15TD4329E:106a-39: sa bdag 'dod la chags pas phan dang gnod pa shes mi 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:106a-40: ji ltar rang dgar rang spyod myos pa'i glang chen bzhin du spyod //
T15TD4329E:106a-41: de 'og 'gyod pas rab gdungs nyam nga'i mya ngan g-yang sar lhung //
T15TD4329E:106a-42: de yis 'khor la nyes pa bgod byed rang gi skyon ma rig / rtsod dus rgyal po nor tshogs thob pa las //
T15TD4329E:106a-43: srog ni srung gi nor ni gtang bar bya //
T15TD4329E:106a-44: ji ltar shan pas lug gi bal bregs nas //
T15TD4329E:106a-45: srog thar byas pa rnyed pa che ba bzhin //
T15TD4329E:106a-46: rtsa ba brang 'gro rtse mo mkha' lding dang //
T15TD4329E:106b-0: yal @106b ga spre 'dzegs me tog bung bas bskor //
T15TD4329E:106b-1: gang zhig gdug pa'i sems can gnas bcas pa //
T15TD4329E:106b-2: tsan dan shing de la ni bsnyen du med //
T15TD4329E:106b-3: gang gis thabs kyis pha rol gnon //
T15TD4329E:106b-4: nus pas ma yin thabs kyis de //
T15TD4329E:106b-5: bya rog gis ni gser phred gi / sbrul dag gsad par gyur la ltos //
T15TD4329E:106b-6: gang la blo yod de stobs ldan //
T15TD4329E:106b-7: blo med stobs kyis ci zhig bya //
T15TD4329E:106b-8: ci zhig seng ge stobs dang ldan //
T15TD4329E:106b-9: ri bong gis ni srog dang phral //
T15TD4329E:106b-10: bya ba'i thabs kyis grogs byed na //
T15TD4329E:106b-11: blo ldan dag la dri bar bya //
T15TD4329E:106b-12: phun sum tshogs pas smos ci dgos //
T15TD4329E:106b-13: phung gyur na yang mdzes pa yin //
T15TD4329E:106b-14: yon tan tshul spyod rang bzhin gsal ba yis //
T15TD4329E:106b-15: skye bo ngan pa bcos su ga la rung //
T15TD4329E:106b-16: tsha zhing drod che rtsub pas bsgrubs pa yi //
T15TD4329E:106b-17: bad kan nad bzhin shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:106b-18: snying la khon du gzung bya yi //
T15TD4329E:106b-19: de la tshig gis mi bskul bar //
T15TD4329E:106b-20: dgra bo'i rkang pa nas gzung zhing //
T15TD4329E:106b-21: tshig gi mtshon chas bsnun par bya ;
T15TD4329E:106b-22: / ji srid 'jigs pa ma byung ba //
T15TD4329E:106b-24: 'jigs pa mngon du byung ba'i tshe //
T15TD4329E:106b-25: 'jigs med lta bur gzhom par bya //
T15TD4329E:106b-26: bden pa zhugs par gyur pa la //
T15TD4329E:106b-27: slu byed mkhas pa yin nam ci //
T15TD4329E:106b-28: pad par brten te nyal ba la //
T15TD4329E:106b-29: gsod pa de ci dpa' bo'am //
T15TD4329E:106b-30: gzhon yang rgan pa'i nye bar zhi la dga' //
T15TD4329E:106b-31: mkhas par gyur kyang shes pa'i nga rgyal med //
T15TD4329E:106b-32: gzi brjid che yang bzod cing des pa'i dang //
T15TD4329E:106b-33: je mthor phyin yang nga rgyal dregs pa med //
T15TD4329E:106b-34: rtag tu sems can phan dga' rnams //
T15TD4329E:106b-35: rin chen sgron ltar mchog yin te //
T15TD4329E:106b-36: snum la ltos par mi byed cing //
T15TD4329E:106b-37: snod dang sdong bu la ltos min //
T15TD4329E:106b-38: sman pa zas ni ma zhu dang //
T15TD4329E:106b-39: rgyal po brdzun du smra ba dang //
T15TD4329E:106b-40: rigs ldan sdig pa spyod pa ste //
T15TD4329E:106b-41: 'di gsum shin tu mi rigs pa'o //
T15TD4329E:106b-42: mthu che ba dang 'grogs gyur na //
T15TD4329E:106b-43: mthon po nyid du su mi 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:106b-44: me tog phreng bar 'brel pa yi //
T15TD4329E:106b-45: skud pa mgo la 'dogs par byed //
T15TD4329E:106b-46: dus la bab par ston pa dang //
T15TD4329E:106b-47: gnas skabs bcas par smra ba dang //
T15TD4329E:106b-48: shin tu ngo mtshar gyur la 'god //
T15TD4329E:106b-50: brtson 'grus brtul phod brtan pa dang //
T15TD4329E:107a-2: 'bad rtsol yon tan drug ldan pa //
T15TD4329E:107a-3: de la lha yang 'jigs pa skye //
T15TD4329E:107a-4: skyon chad dgra bo pham par byas pa dag / mdza' bor 'dod 'ongs pa la yid mi brtan //
T15TD4329E:107a-5: brag phug 'ug pa'i tshogs kyis gad ba la //
T15TD4329E:107a-6: bya rog gis ni me btang bsregs la ltos //
T15TD4329E:107a-7: za dang gnyid log 'jigs dang 'khrig pa spyod //
T15TD4329E:107a-8: mi dang phyugs rnams de dag mnyam pa yin //
T15TD4329E:107a-9: chos spyod pa yi mi rnams khyad par 'phags //
T15TD4329E:107a-10: chos mi shes na phyugs dang ci mi mnyam //
T15TD4329E:107a-11: gang zhig chos la smod pa rnams //
T15TD4329E:107a-13: de ni mgar ba'i sbud pa yin //
T15TD4329E:107a-14: dbugs 'byin kyang ni gson ma yin //
T15TD4329E:107a-15: sangs rgyas mgon po yongs spangs te //
T15TD4329E:107a-16: lha gzhan la ni phyag byed pa //
T15TD4329E:107a-17: blo ngan gang g'a'i 'gram du ni //
T15TD4329E:107a-18: skom nas khron pa byed dang mtshungs //
T15TD4329E:107a-19: yul ni shin tu yun ring gnas kyang nges pa kho nar 'gro bar 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:107a-20: 'bral la khyad par ci zhig yod la 'gro ba rang nyid sdong mi byed //
T15TD4329E:107a-21: dbang med 'bral bas yid la yongs su gdung ba mtha' yas skyed par byed //
T15TD4329E:107a-22: 'di dag rang gis spong na zhi ba'i bde ba mtha' yas 'thob par 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:107a-24: 'byor ba mnyam dga' yin mod kyi //
T15TD4329E:107a-26: nad med chang 'thung khur par mtshungs //
T15TD4329E:107a-27: 'gro ba'i dri ma chags pa 'dra ba med //
T15TD4329E:107a-28: gzhan la gnod pa phrag dog 'dra ba med //
T15TD4329E:107a-29: mdza' bo slong mo pa 'dra yod min te //
T15TD4329E:107a-30: gtong dang mnyam pa'i gnyen bshes gang yang med //
T15TD4329E:107a-31: shes rab dang mnyam mig med de //
T15TD4329E:107a-32: rmongs pa dang mnyam mun pa med //
T15TD4329E:107a-33: nad dang 'dra ba'i dgra med de ;
T15TD4329E:107a-35: de bas shin tu mi bzad ba'i //
T15TD4329E:107a-37: 'dod pa rnams la sems bzlog la //
T15TD4329E:107a-38: dam pa'i chos la dga' bar gyis //
T15TD4329E:107a-39: grogs po 'di na nor de yod legs pas //
T15TD4329E:107a-40: yid bzhin nor khyed rdor 'gyur nor ma byed //
T15TD4329E:107a-41: spur long rgyan gyi dam par byed 'gyur pa //
T15TD4329E:107a-42: der ni 'di 'dra'i nor bu 'jig rten phung //
T15TD4329E:107a-43: gang zhig sa stengs 'bru rnams dang //
T15TD4329E:107a-44: gser dang phyugs dang nad med rnams //
T15TD4329E:107a-45: de dag kun gyis gcig mi ngoms //
T15TD4329E:107a-46: de ltar shes nas zhi bar gyis //
T15TD4329E:107a-47: 'bad pas bsags pa'i nor la ni //
T15TD4329E:107b-0: yang dang yang du @107b nyugs par byed //
T15TD4329E:107b-1: bkren pas byi ba ji bzhin du //
T15TD4329E:107b-2: nor rnams sdug bsngal kho nar zad //
T15TD4329E:107b-4: nor dang longs spyod brtan ma yin //
T15TD4329E:107b-5: bu dang chung ma brtan min gyi //
T15TD4329E:107b-6: chos dang grags pa snyan pa brtan //
T15TD4329E:107b-7: rgyal po na ro sogs ngoms pa med //
T15TD4329E:107b-8: mkhas pa legs bshad kyis ma ngoms //
T15TD4329E:107b-9: rgya mtsho chu yis ngoms pa med //
T15TD4329E:107b-10: 'jig rten sdug la bltas mi ngoms //
T15TD4329E:107b-11: me la shing gis ngoms pa med //
T15TD4329E:107b-12: byis pa 'dod pas ngoms pa med //
T15TD4329E:107b-13: tshul khrims dag dang dul ba dang //
T15TD4329E:107b-14: sems ni dul bar gyur pa dang //
T15TD4329E:107b-15: gang zhig drang por zhugs pa dag /
T15TD4329E:107b-16: de la gnas na ci zhig dgos //
T15TD4329E:107b-17: chog shes dbang phyug la gnas na //
T15TD4329E:107b-18: skye bo ngan pa'i sa dang ring //
T15TD4329E:107b-19: longs spyod 'dod pa'i sred bas bcing //
T15TD4329E:107b-20: gom re brnyas pa thob par 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:107b-21: lus zhes bya ba skyon ldan 'di //
T15TD4329E:107b-22: yon tan chen po gcig yin te //
T15TD4329E:107b-23: gnas skabs gang dang gang phrad pa //
T15TD4329E:107b-24: de dang der 'gro go ra ba //
T15TD4329E:107b-25: nags kyi glang po rtsva lo za yang stobs dang ldan //
T15TD4329E:107b-26: sbrul ni zas su rlung zar gyur kyang sbegs pa med //
T15TD4329E:107b-27: drang srong rtsa ba 'bras bu tsam gyis dus 'das byed //
T15TD4329E:107b-28: de bas khrel 'dzem chog shes kho na 'byor ba'i mchog / tshod ma ngag dang rdul med pa'i //
T15TD4329E:107b-29: chu yi dgon pa ga na'ang yod //
T15TD4329E:107b-30: zla ba thun mong mar me yin //
T15TD4329E:107b-31: 'byor pa dag gis ci zhig bya //
T15TD4329E:107b-32: chog shes nges pa'i bdag nyid can //
T15TD4329E:107b-33: 'tsho ba gang na'ang btsal mi dka' //
T15TD4329E:107b-34: rtsva dang lo ma chu yi gnas //
T15TD4329E:107b-35: gang na'ang med pa ma yin no //
T15TD4329E:107b-36: nags mchog stag dang glang po'i gtsos bsten par //
T15TD4329E:107b-37: rtsva yi stan byas shing shun gos su gyon //
T15TD4329E:107b-38: shing gi 'bras bu la sogs zas za ba'i //
T15TD4329E:107b-39: nor med nye du'i tshogs nang gson pa min //
T15TD4329E:107b-40: bzang po'am ni ngan pa yi //
T15TD4329E:107b-41: sbyor ba gang yang rung ba yis //
T15TD4329E:107b-42: lus ni shin tu bsrung bya yi //
T15TD4329E:107b-43: nor la chags pas ci zhig bya //
T15TD4329E:107b-44: bsod nams chen po'i rin gyis ni ;
T15TD4329E:107b-45: / khyod kyis lus kyi gru nyos pa //
T15TD4329E:107b-46: ji srid chag par ma gyur par //
T15TD4329E:107b-47: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol song //
T15TD4329E:107b-48: ji srid sdug pa'i dus kyi zla rgyas pa //
T15TD4329E:107b-49: 'chi bdag gza' chen 'di yis ma rnyed pa //
T15TD4329E:107b-50: de srid bag yod par ni gnas bya ste //
T15TD4329E:107b-51: rang gi bya ba dag ni bya ba'i rigs //
T15TD4329E:108a-1: 'du shes bral zhing mig mi g-yo //
T15TD4329E:108a-2: skigs bu rgyun 'byung dbugs mthar thug pas slebs //
T15TD4329E:108a-3: mun par g-yang sa cher khrid ltar gyur na //
T15TD4329E:108a-4: de tshe bu dang chung ma gnyen cir 'ong //
T15TD4329E:108a-5: snying rjes gdungs pa'i yid dang dbang po dul zhing sems ni chog shes dag la dga' ba dang ;
T15TD4329E:108a-6: / chags bral mngon dga'i sems dang shing drung dag na lhung pa'i 'bras bus bza' ba'i bya ba byed //
T15TD4329E:108a-7: lus ring shing shun gyon zhing rgyal ba zhes ni snyan pa lta bur sgra sgrogs la //
T15TD4329E:108a-8: b'a r'a na s'ir gshin rje'i dbang gyur bcom pa'i lus chig 'di ni nam zhig spong bar 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:108a-9: bstan bcos 'dzin pas thar pa yin //
T15TD4329E:108a-10: lus dub bas kyang ma yin te //
T15TD4329E:108a-11: shes rab kyis ni sems btul na //
T15TD4329E:108a-12: thar pa thag nye 'di na yod //
T15TD4329E:108a-13: nyes pa'i skyon ni breg par gyis //
T15TD4329E:108a-14: mgo bo bregs pas ci zhig bya //
T15TD4329E:108a-15: gang zhig yid kyi gos med na //
T15TD4329E:108a-16: ras kyi chos gos ci la phan //
T15TD4329E:108a-17: sems can rnams la gang gi tshems //
T15TD4329E:108a-18: snying rjes brlan par gyur pa dag / thar dang ye shes de yin gyi //
T15TD4329E:108a-19: thal ba ral pa chos gos min //
T15TD4329E:108a-20: gang zhig lang tsho la zhi ba //
T15TD4329E:108a-21: de ni zhi bar bdag gis shes //
T15TD4329E:108a-22: khams rnams yongs su zad pa na //
T15TD4329E:108a-23: ci yi phyir na zhi mi 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:108a-24: mdza' bshes nye du dur khrod du //
T15TD4329E:108a-25: du ba 'thul nas ldog par byed //
T15TD4329E:108a-26: gang zhig rang dang lhan cig 'grogs //
T15TD4329E:108a-27: las te des na dge ba sbyang //
T15TD4329E:108a-28: gang zhig rab tu nyon mongs dang //
T15TD4329E:108a-29: chos dang 'gal bar byed pa dang //
T15TD4329E:108a-30: dgra la 'dud pa'i nor rnams ni //
T15TD4329E:108a-31: gang gi nor du rung ma yin //
T15TD4329E:108a-32: dam pa legs spyod la sred shin tu bsdams gyur te //
T15TD4329E:108a-33: kun du 'ang skye bos smod 'jigs rtag tu sdug bsngal gnas //
T15TD4329E:108a-34: gang zhig 'dzem med longs spyod ngag gi rtsa rtsol ba //
T15TD4329E:108a-35: rigs dang mi rigs dpyod med tha mal skye bo skyed //
T15TD4329E:108a-36: rigs dang mi rigs dpyod pa'i blo med cing //
T15TD4329E:108a-37: thos dang sdom pa mang po rnam spangs nas //
T15TD4329E:108a-38: lto ba 'gengs pa tsam zhig 'ba' zhig 'dod //
T15TD4329E:108a-39: skyes bu phyugs dang phyugs la khyad ci yod //
T15TD4329E:108a-40: mthong dang ma mthong yon tan gyi //
T15TD4329E:108a-41: 'byung gnas chen po rigs pa yin //
T15TD4329E:108a-42: des na de bas don gnyer bas //
T15TD4329E:108a-43: shes rab yongs su gzung bar bya //
T15TD4329E:108a-44: brgya yi nang nas dpa' bo skye //
T15TD4329E:108a-45: stong gi nang nas mkhas pa 'byung //
T15TD4329E:108b-0: brgya @108b stong las ni mdzangs pa ste //
T15TD4329E:108b-1: stong pa skye'am mi skye'ang srid //
T15TD4329E:108b-2: mkhas pas rig pa rnam kun du //
T15TD4329E:108b-3: na tshod yol yang bslab par bya //
T15TD4329E:108b-5: skye ba gzhan du rnyed pa sla //
T15TD4329E:108b-6: skra dkar gnyer ma lhags dus su'ang //
T15TD4329E:108b-7: thos pa bsags par bya ba ste //
T15TD4329E:108b-10: rgyal po dang ni yon tan ldan //
T15TD4329E:108b-11: de gnyis 'dra ba ma yin te //
T15TD4329E:108b-12: rgyal po rang gi yul na bkur //
T15TD4329E:108b-13: yon tan ldan pa kun du bkur //
T15TD4329E:108b-14: yon tan ldan pa skyon yod kyang //
T15TD4329E:108b-15: yon tan dga' rnams skyo mi byed //
T15TD4329E:108b-16: zla ba rnyog pa yod gyur kyang //
T15TD4329E:108b-17: brtan rnams dga' bas lta bar byed //
T15TD4329E:108b-18: yon tan dang 'dra lus kyi rgyan gzhan med //
T15TD4329E:108b-19: sems las dang 'dra lus kyi sdug bsngal med //
T15TD4329E:108b-20: bzod pa dang 'dra lus kyi srung ma med //
T15TD4329E:108b-21: gtong ba dang mnyam gnyen ni gang na med //
T15TD4329E:108b-22: dam pa ring na gnas gyur kyang //
T15TD4329E:108b-23: yon tan pho nya nyid byed de //
T15TD4329E:108b-24: ke ta ka yi dri bsnams nas //
T15TD4329E:108b-26: yon tan dag la 'bad bya yi //
T15TD4329E:108b-27: 'gying tshul dgos pa ci zhig yod //
T15TD4329E:108b-28: ba ni 'o ma med pa la //
T15TD4329E:108b-29: dril bu btags kyang nyo mi 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:108b-30: dus ni yun thung rig pa'i rnam pa mang //
T15TD4329E:108b-31: tshe yi tshad kyang ji tsam mi shes pas //
T15TD4329E:108b-32: dang pas chu nang nas ni 'o ma bzhin //
T15TD4329E:108b-33: gang zhig gces pa de ni bsten par bya //
T15TD4329E:108b-34: skar ma chen po mang du shar gyur cing //
T15TD4329E:108b-35: sa yi rgyan gyur zla ba shar na yang //
T15TD4329E:108b-36: gang du nyi ma nub na mtshan mor 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:108b-37: nyi ma ma gtogs shar nub ming mi 'dogs //
T15TD4329E:108b-38: gang zhig shar bar gyur na ni //
T15TD4329E:108b-39: mun pa med cing gzi can byed //
T15TD4329E:108b-40: nyi ma shar ba mchog yin gyi //
T15TD4329E:108b-41: gzhan rnams shar bas ci zhig bya //
T15TD4329E:108b-42: skyes bu bya ba gang yin gcig byas mthar phyin pas //
T15TD4329E:108b-43: sems 'phags 'gyur te mang po ci la dgos //
T15TD4329E:108b-44: zla ba rgyas pas sa stengs gsal ba bzhin //
T15TD4329E:108b-45: skar ma mang po'i tshogs kyis nus ma yin //
T15TD4329E:108b-46: yon tan skyes pa rang khar las //
T15TD4329E:108b-47: rdzas ni bsod nams khar las pas //
T15TD4329E:108b-48: skyes bu la ni ci phyir smre //
T15TD4329E:108b-49: yon tan 'bad pas bsgrub bya yin //
T15TD4329E:108b-50: 'bad pa'ang bdag nyid la gnas na //
T15TD4329E:108b-51: gzhan dag yon tan ldan zhes te //
T15TD4329E:109a-0: de ltar gson pa su yis @109a * //
T15TD4329E:109a-2: bstan bcos don ni shes pa'i mi //
T15TD4329E:109a-3: 'di na zha bo rnams la'ang mang //
T15TD4329E:109a-4: ral gri'i rtse mo rnon po yis //
T15TD4329E:109a-5: dgra las rgyal byed de rnyed dka' //
T15TD4329E:109a-6: phyug po kla klo rnams la'ang yod //
T15TD4329E:109a-7: dpa' bo dud 'gro rnams la'ang mang //
T15TD4329E:109a-8: sna tshogs don gyi gtam smra ba'i //
T15TD4329E:109a-9: dam pa dag ni kun du dkon //
T15TD4329E:109a-10: ri bo kun la tsandan med //
T15TD4329E:109a-11: glang po kun la mu tig med //
T15TD4329E:109a-12: yang dag don gyi gtam smra ba'i //
T15TD4329E:109a-13: mkhas pa'ang kun na yod ma yin//
T15TD4329E:109a-14: yon tan shes la de nyid yon tan 'gyur//
T15TD4329E:109a-15: yon tan med na de nyid skyon du 'gyur//
T15TD4329E:109a-16: chu bo'i chu ni shin tu skyon med pa'ang //
T15TD4329E:109a-17: rgya mtshor phyin na btung du mi rung 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:109a-18: yon tan ldan pa yon tan la dga' yi //
T15TD4329E:109a-19: yon tan med pa yon tan gyis mi mgu //
T15TD4329E:109a-20: bung ba nags nas padmar 'ong 'gyur gyi //
T15TD4329E:109a-21: sbal pa lhan cig gnas kyang de lta min //
T15TD4329E:109a-22: mkhas pa rnams kyi grags pa ni //
T15TD4329E:109a-23: mkhas pa nyid kyi nang du 'phel //
T15TD4329E:109a-24: rin chen shel la rin chen dang //
T15TD4329E:109a-25: g-yul ngo dag tu dpa' bo bzhin //
T15TD4329E:109a-26: ngang pa khva yi tshogs nang mdzes ma yin //
T15TD4329E:109a-27: cang shes bong bu'i tshogs nang mdzes ma yin //
T15TD4329E:109a-28: seng ge wa yi tshogs nang mdzes ma yin //
T15TD4329E:109a-29: mkhas pa blun po'i tshogs nang mdzes ma yin //
T15TD4329E:109a-30: gang zhig chen pos spyi bos bkur //
T15TD4329E:109a-31: de nyid dman pas rtsva snyam sems //
T15TD4329E:109a-32: mkhas pas phyag byas mchod rten ni //
T15TD4329E:109a-33: khva dag stan du byed pa yin //
T15TD4329E:109a-34: bdag la grangs med yod gyur kyang //
T15TD4329E:109a-35: gzhan la nyung zad yod pa yi //
T15TD4329E:109a-36: yon tan med la dam pa dga' //
T15TD4329E:109a-37: spyod pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che //
T15TD4329E:109a-38: thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan ni //
T15TD4329E:109a-39: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis mkhyen //
T15TD4329E:109a-40: sa gzhi yi ni lci ba'i tshad //
T15TD4329E:109a-41: mtha' yas nyid kyis shes pa yin //
T15TD4329E:109a-42: gzhan gyis gzhan dag bsgrags na ni //
T15TD4329E:109a-43: med pa'ang yon tan can du 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:109a-44: yon tan rang nyid sgrogs pa ni //
T15TD4329E:109a-45: brgya byin yin yang mi btsun 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:109a-46: gang du yon tan ldan mi mchod //
T15TD4329E:109a-47: mkhas pa de ru ci phyir 'gro //
T15TD4329E:109a-48: gos med gcer bu'i grong khyer du //
T15TD4329E:109a-49: khrus mkhan gyis ni ci zhig bya //
T15TD4329E:109a-51: rang rgyud grub pa yod yin te /
T15TD4329E:109a-52: gzhan gyis byas pa'i rje 'brang bas //
T15TD4329E:109a-53: zangs ma'i snod ni stor nas med //
T15TD4329E:109a-54: bzhad gad mkhan dang mkhas pa gnyis //
T15TD4329E:109b-0: blun la bzhad gang byed pa mchog / bzhad gad @109b mkhan gyis nor rnyed kyis //
T15TD4329E:109b-1: mkhas la nor med stong par 'gro //
T15TD4329E:109b-2: sna tshogs don ldan gtan rgyud kyis //
T15TD4329E:109b-3: mkhas pa dus ni 'da' bar byed //
T15TD4329E:109b-4: dbul po chos kyis phongs gyur pas //
T15TD4329E:109b-5: gnyid log na yang 'thab par byed //
T15TD4329E:109b-6: gang zhig mang po tshogs par gyur pa las //
T15TD4329E:109b-7: skye bo dam pa'i yon tan sten mi byed //
T15TD4329E:109b-8: de ni rang gi ma yi sdug bsngal gyis //
T15TD4329E:109b-9: bskyed de skyes par gyur kyang ci zhig phan //
T15TD4329E:109b-10: mkhas pa'i tshul ni rigs pa yin //
T15TD4329E:109b-11: khu byug tshul ni sgra snyan yin //
T15TD4329E:109b-12: dka' thub tshul ni bzod pa yin //
T15TD4329E:109b-13: bud med tshul ni nyon mongs yin //
T15TD4329E:109b-14: skar rtsis de bzhin grub mtha' dang //
T15TD4329E:109b-15: mkha' lding sngags dang sngags smra ba //
T15TD4329E:109b-16: don gyi de nyid gzung bya yi //
T15TD4329E:109b-17: sgra la dpyad par mi bya'o //
T15TD4329E:109b-18: glegs bam la bzhag rig pa dang /
T15TD4329E:109b-19: gzhan la tshol ba'i nor dag ni //
T15TD4329E:109b-20: dgos pa'i dus la bab pa na //
T15TD4329E:109b-21: de ni nor min rig pa min //
T15TD4329E:109b-22: bzo slob pa yi yon tan kun //
T15TD4329E:109b-23: yon tan 'tsho ba'i rgyu tsam yin //
T15TD4329E:109b-24: 'khor ba gcod pa'i blo gros gang //
T15TD4329E:109b-25: ci yi phyir na de mi byin //
T15TD4329E:109b-26: mi ni su la'ang ma brtags par //
T15TD4329E:109b-27: gdams ngag spyin par mi bya ste //
T15TD4329E:109b-28: spre'u tsam gyi gnas bcas dang //
T15TD4329E:109b-29: gnas med par ni byas la ltos //
T15TD4329E:109b-30: kha cig smra ba lhur len te //
T15TD4329E:109b-31: kha cig mi smra don yang bsgrub //
T15TD4329E:109b-33: star ka 'bras bu me tog ldan //
T15TD4329E:109b-34: ke ta ka yi 'bras bu ni //
T15TD4329E:109b-35: chu rnams dang bar byed mod kyi //
T15TD4329E:109b-36: de yi ming tsam smos pa yis//
T15TD4329E:109b-37: chu rdul dang bar mi byed do//
T15TD4329E:109b-38: gzhung lugs dag la byang byas kyang //
T15TD4329E:109b-39: nyams su len par mi byed na//
T15TD4329E:109b-40: lag na sgron ma yod kyang ni //
T15TD4329E:109b-41: long bas lam ni mthong mi 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:109b-42: zla ba yar ngo mar ngo lta //
T15TD4329E:109b-43: dam pa dam min bsten pa las //
T15TD4329E:109b-44: yon tan chung du'ang rgyas 'gyur zhing /
T15TD4329E:109b-46: mkhas pas dgra bor gyur pa'ang bla'i //
T15TD4329E:109b-47: mi mkhas pa dad mdza' ba min //
T15TD4329E:109b-48: rkun pos bram ze bsrungs pa dang //
T15TD4329E:109b-49: spre'us rgyal po'i mig bcar bzhin //
T15TD4329E:109b-50: mkhas pa dang ni dul ba dang //
T15TD4329E:109b-51: chog shes bden par smra ba dang //
T15TD4329E:109b-53: skye bo ngan dang rgyal srid min //
T15TD4329E:110a-0: sbrul gdug skye bo ngan ba dug / sbrul las lhag par skye ngan dug / sbrul @110a * //
T15TD4329E:110a-1: gdug sman dang sngags kyis thub //
T15TD4329E:110a-2: skye ngan gdug pa gang gis zhi //
T15TD4329E:110a-3: skye bo ngan pa yon tan brgya yis phan btags te //
T15TD4329E:110a-4: dga' bar gyur kyang de ni tshig rtsub smra bar byed //
T15TD4329E:110a-5: gang zhig rigs ldan de bzhin brtan pa dang //
T15TD4329E:110a-6: bsngags 'os phongs kyang yon tan gtong mi byed //
T15TD4329E:110a-7: rang bzhin ngan pa'i mi dag dang //
T15TD4329E:110a-8: srang gi mtshan nyid dag dang mtshungs //
T15TD4329E:110a-9: cung zad tsam gyis mtho 'gyur zhing //
T15TD4329E:110a-10: cung zad tsam gyis dma' bar 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:110a-11: tsan dan gla rtsi ga bur gyis byugs kyang //
T15TD4329E:110a-12: sgog skya'i rang bzhin dri nga mi 'dor ltar //
T15TD4329E:110a-13: rigs pa'i gzhung lugs mang po rab bslabs kyang //
T15TD4329E:110a-14: rang bzhin ngan pa'i mtshan nyid 'dor mi srid //
T15TD4329E:110a-15: dam pa'i bu la gdong na padma med //
T15TD4329E:110a-16: smad 'tshong bu la glad nas rva ma skyes //
T15TD4329E:110a-17: ji lta ji ltar log par byed gyur pa //
T15TD4329E:110a-18: de lta de ltar nal bu'i mtshan nyid yin //
T15TD4329E:110a-19: kha nas smras pa'i tshig gzhan la //
T15TD4329E:110a-20: yid la sems pa'i bsam pa gzhan //
T15TD4329E:110a-21: kye ma yon pa'i blo gros can //
T15TD4329E:110a-22: 'di yi rang bzhin su yis sbrul //
T15TD4329E:110a-23: 'bad pas skyin ni len par byed //
T15TD4329E:110a-24: yon tan rtag tu spong bar byed //
T15TD4329E:110a-25: skyon len yon tan spong ba yi //
T15TD4329E:110a-26: skye bo ngan pa chu tshags 'dra //
T15TD4329E:110a-27: skye bo nang pa sun phyung na //
T15TD4329E:110a-28: dam pa la yang yid mi rton //
T15TD4329E:110a-29: byis pa 'o mas kha tshig na //
T15TD4329E:110a-31: mtshan mo mtsho nang skar ma'i gzugs brnyan snang ba la /
T15TD4329E:110a-32: ngang pa padma'i rtsa bar 'khrul pas sun phyung ba //
T15TD4329E:110a-33: nyin mo pad rtsa mngon sum mthong yang za mi byed //
T15TD4329E:110a-34: brdzun smras sun phyung bden pa la yang dogs pa skye //
T15TD4329E:110a-35: bud med zas ni nyis 'gyur te //
T15TD4329E:110a-36: de yi g-yo sgyu bzhi 'gyur ro //
T15TD4329E:110a-37: ngo tsha dag ni drug 'gyur ro //
T15TD4329E:110a-39: sbyin pas ma yin rim gros min //
T15TD4329E:110a-40: mchod pas ma yin bsnyen bkur min //
T15TD4329E:110a-41: brtan pas ma yin brtson pas min //
T15TD4329E:110a-42: kun du mi bzad bud med yin //
T15TD4329E:110a-43: mkha' lding dbang pos khyer ba'i tshe //
T15TD4329E:110a-44: pad dkar klu yis smras pa ni //
T15TD4329E:110a-45: gsang tshig bud med la smra ba //
T15TD4329E:110a-46: de yi srog ni de zad 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:110a-47: don dang chos ni rnam par nyams byed cing //
T15TD4329E:110a-48: mtho ris dag dang thar pa'i gegs byed la //
T15TD4329E:110a-49: gnod pa kun gyi rtsa ba nyid gyur pas //
T15TD4329E:110a-50: de bas gzhan gyi bud med rtag tu spang //
T15TD4329E:110a-51: gang gis tshigs bcad gcig tsam zhig //
T15TD4329E:110b-0: bla mas @110b slob ma la byin na //
T15TD4329E:110b-1: gang zhig btang nas shog btang 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:110b-2: rdzas de sa steng yod ma yin //
T15TD4329E:110b-4: gal te de spong ma nus na //
T15TD4329E:110b-5: dam pa dag dang 'dre bar gyis //
T15TD4329E:110b-6: de nyid de yi sman yin no //
T15TD4329E:110b-7: 'dod pa kun du spang bar gyis //
T15TD4329E:110b-8: gal te spong bar ma nus na //
T15TD4329E:110b-9: thar pa dag la 'dod par gyis //
T15TD4329E:110b-10: de nyid de yi sman yin no //
T15TD4329E:110b-11: phan med gnyen dang gzhan yin te //
T15TD4329E:110b-12: pha rol yin yang gang phan gnyen //
T15TD4329E:110b-13: lhan cig 'byung b'i lus sogs nad //
T15TD4329E:110b-14: phan byed dgod pa'i sman bzhin no //
T15TD4329E:110b-15: 'bad pa yis ni bzung ba yi //
T15TD4329E:110b-16: bum pa yi ni chu phyed bzhin //
T15TD4329E:110b-17: spyi bo la ni bkur byas na //
T15TD4329E:110b-18: skye bo nang pa khro bar byed //
T15TD4329E:110b-19: gang zhig yid dang rjes mthun pa //
T15TD4329E:110b-20: ring na gnas kyang nye ba yin //
T15TD4329E:110b-21: gang zhig yid la brtan mi gnas //
T15TD4329E:110b-22: drung na gnas kyang ring ba yin //
T15TD4329E:110b-23: dam pa min dang lhan cig gnas gyur kyang //
T15TD4329E:110b-24: chu dang pad mo bzhin du 'dres mi 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:110b-25: dam pa thag ring dag tu gnas gyur kyang //
T15TD4329E:110b-26: zla ba ku mu ta ltar dga' bar byed //
T15TD4329E:110b-27: gal te rtag tu mdza' 'dod na //
T15TD4329E:110b-28: gsum po 'di dag mi bya ste //
T15TD4329E:110b-30: lkog tu chung ma dang smra ba'o //
T15TD4329E:110b-32: 'dam bu me tog sbrang rtsi 'dzag / gal te bud med bden gyur na //
T15TD4329E:110b-33: skam sa las kyang padma skye //
T15TD4329E:110b-34: bsod nams yongs su dman pa'i mis //
T15TD4329E:110b-35: longs spyod thob kyang spyod mi shes //
T15TD4329E:110b-36: gangs chen mtsho la khyi bzhin skom na'ang lce yis lhag par byed //
T15TD4329E:110b-38: gla med lam brgyags khyer mi btub //
T15TD4329E:110b-39: slong ba dman pa mi mngon par //
T15TD4329E:110b-40: phyi ma'i dus na brgya 'gyur khyer //
T15TD4329E:110b-42: skyes bu sbyin pa gtong bar byed //
T15TD4329E:110b-43: shi na'ang nor ni mi 'dor bas //
T15TD4329E:110b-44: sbyin byed ser sna can 'drar shes //
T15TD4329E:110b-45: sbyin na dbul gyur dogs pa yis //
T15TD4329E:110b-46: bkren pa sbyin pa gtong mi byed //
T15TD4329E:110b-47: nges par 'jig pa de nyid kyis //
T15TD4329E:110b-48: mkhas pas nor ni gtong bar byed //
T15TD4329E:110b-49: zas las zan gyi phyed tsam yang //
T15TD4329E:110b-50: slong ba rnams la cis mi ster //
T15TD4329E:110b-53: las kyis 'byor pa med kyang gdung ba mi skyed kyi //
T15TD4329E:110b-54: 'on kyang ci 'byor pa la sbyin pa gtang bya ste //
T15TD4329E:111a-0: @111a * // lo ma me tog 'bras bu chu dang sman rnams ni //
T15TD4329E:111a-1: thams cad mtha' yas bsngo ba'i stobs kyis mtha' yas 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:111a-2: sbyin dang spyod pas stong ba yi //
T15TD4329E:111a-3: nor des nor bdag yin na go / nor de nyid kyis bdag kyang ni //
T15TD4329E:111a-4: nor gyi bdag po cis ma yin /
T15TD4329E:111a-5: yab gcig 'di ni las kyi sa //
T15TD4329E:111a-7: 'di ni gang zhig byas gyur pa //
T15TD4329E:111a-8: de nyid gzhan du nges par spyod //
T15TD4329E:111a-9: gzhan 'byor rigs dang gzugs dang nad med nyid //
T15TD4329E:111a-10: mthong nas 'dir ni ci phyir gdung bar byed //
T15TD4329E:111a-11: gal te 'di kun khyod 'dod bsod nams kyi //
T15TD4329E:111a-12: sa bon las ni 'bras 'byung ma thos sam //
T15TD4329E:111a-13: 'byor ba yod kyang gtong med na //
T15TD4329E:111a-14: nye bar 'tsho bas ci byar yod //
T15TD4329E:111a-15: kim pa ka yi 'bras bu ni //
T15TD4329E:111a-16: chag kyang ltogs la ci byar yod //
T15TD4329E:111a-17: gang zhig gzhan la gnod pa med par sbyin gtong ba //
T15TD4329E:111a-18: 'di yi longs spyod sna tshogs chu yis mi 'khyer zhing //
T15TD4329E:111a-19: me yis mi tshugs rkun po rnams kyis 'phrog mi nus //
T15TD4329E:111a-20: de yi 'byor pa nam yang rab nyams mi 'gyur ro //
T15TD4329E:111a-21: gang zhig dmyal ba'i nad la ni //
T15TD4329E:111a-22: gso ba dag ni mi byed pa //
T15TD4329E:111a-23: sman med gnas su song nas ni //
T15TD4329E:111a-24: nad dang bcas pas ci byar yod //
T15TD4329E:111a-25: mi srun skye bo sa khung las byung ba'i //
T15TD4329E:111a-26: tshig ni sbrul gyis skye bo dam pa zin //
T15TD4329E:111a-27: dug de zhi bar byed pa'i gnyen por yang //
T15TD4329E:111a-28: shes rab bzod pa'i sman dag btung bar bya //
T15TD4329E:111a-29: ji srid 'tsho bar bsad kyang ni //
T15TD4329E:111a-30: dgra bo zad par mi 'gyur gyi //
T15TD4329E:111a-31: de ni dgra bo nyid gsod yin //
T15TD4329E:111a-32: mthu chen bcos su mi rung la //
T15TD4329E:111a-33: bzod pa byar yang ci zhig yod //
T15TD4329E:111a-34: dul ba zhi ba'i spyod pa la //
T15TD4329E:111a-35: bzod par bya yang ci zhig dgos //
T15TD4329E:111a-36: gnod byed 'os pas khro zhe na //
T15TD4329E:111a-37: chos don 'dod dang thar ba dag / mngon sum du ni 'jig byed pa'i //
T15TD4329E:111a-38: khro la khyod ni cis mi khro //
T15TD4329E:111a-39: gzhan gyi 'byor pa dam pa mthong nas ni //
T15TD4329E:111a-40: gang zhig sems 'khrug pa ni skye 'gyur bas //
T15TD4329E:111a-41: don de cung zad rnyed par mi 'gyur gyi //
T15TD4329E:111a-42: 'gro de rang gi bsod nams 'joms par byed //
T15TD4329E:111a-43: thams cad chos ni mnyan par bya //
T15TD4329E:111a-44: thos nas rab tu gzung bya ste //
T15TD4329E:111a-45: gang zhig bdag nyid mi 'dod pa //
T15TD4329E:111a-46: de dag gzhan la mi bya'o //
T15TD4329E:111a-47: 'jig rten pa rol 'gro ba dag / shes par smra la su zhig mkhas //
T15TD4329E:111b-0: de ni nyams su len @111b pa na //
T15TD4329E:111b-1: drang srong rnams kyang mkhas pa yin //
T15TD4329E:111b-2: 'byor pa g-yo zhing lang tsho yud kyis 'jig / srog ni gshin rje'i so gcig gnas dang mtshungs //
T15TD4329E:111b-3: 'on kyang 'jig rten pha rol sgrub la lhod //
T15TD4329E:111b-4: kye ma mi yi spyod pa ngo mtshar che //
T15TD4329E:111b-5: blo gros bzang yang le lo yis //
T15TD4329E:111b-6: skye ba mthon por mi 'gyur te ;
T15TD4329E:111b-7: / lag rtsis sa la 'dri ba yi //
T15TD4329E:111b-8: pho long gsher ba dag dang mtshungs //
T15TD4329E:111b-10: 'chi bdag spyi bor gnas mthong na //
T15TD4329E:111b-11: zas kyang yi gar mi 'ong na //
T15TD4329E:111b-12: bya ba gzhan lta smos ci dgos //
T15TD4329E:111b-13: 'dus byas zin tam ma zin ces //
T15TD4329E:111b-15: sang gi bya ba de ring bya //
T15TD4329E:111b-16: phyi dro'i bya ba snga dro bya //
T15TD4329E:111b-17: ji srid nang med lo tog skyes gyur ba //
T15TD4329E:111b-18: nad kyi ser ba chen pos ma brlag cing //
T15TD4329E:111b-19: ji srid blo ni bya ba'i rjes 'jug pa //
T15TD4329E:111b-20: 'di ni dam chos mnyan pa'i dus yin no //
T15TD4329E:111b-21: bong bu phyugs la me tog phreng ba ci //
T15TD4329E:111b-22: dud 'gro phag la kha zas zhim po ci ;
T15TD4329E:111b-23: / long la snang dang 'on pa dag la glu //
T15TD4329E:111b-24: glen pa rnams la chos kyis ci zhig bya //
T15TD4329E:111b-25: ji srid 'dod chen ma gyur par //
T15TD4329E:111b-26: de srid yon tan che nyid yin //
T15TD4329E:111b-27: 'dod chen nyid la zhugs gyur na //
T15TD4329E:111b-28: yon tan btsun par ga la 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:111b-29: ji srid su la'ang mi slong pa //
T15TD4329E:111b-30: de srid dka' thub gzi brjid can //
T15TD4329E:111b-31: dpa' zhing shes ldan rigs mtho dag / skyes bu zhes kyang de srid brjod //
T15TD4329E:111b-32: dang po'i rtsom pa gang yin pa //
T15TD4329E:111b-33: 'di ltar ngo mtshar che ba yin //
T15TD4329E:111b-34: zo chun bzo sbyar gyur pa ni //
T15TD4329E:111b-35: bud med kyi yang dbang du 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:111b-36: drang srong bu ni myur du shi yang rung //
T15TD4329E:111b-37: rgyal po'i bu ni yun ring gson yang rung ;
T15TD4329E:111b-38: / rngon pa'i bu ni shi'am gson mi rung //
T15TD4329E:111b-39: dam pa'i bu ni shi'am gson yang rung //
T15TD4329E:111b-40: de nas 'byung ba la gnas pa'i //
T15TD4329E:111b-41: mi yi blo ni 'phel bya'i phyir //
T15TD4329E:111b-42: gang gis bstan bcos shes gyur ba'i //
T15TD4329E:111b-43: legs par bshad pa bshad par bya //
T15TD4329E:111b-44: legs par bshad pa'i rang bzhin tshig /
T15TD4329E:111b-45: gang yang rung ba bsag par bya //
T15TD4329E:111b-46: tshig gi gnas skabs mchod sbyin la //
T15TD4329E:111b-47: nor med ci zhig ster bar byed //
T15TD4329E:111b-48: rig pa bslab dang dpa' bo dang //
T15TD4329E:111b-49: gang yang gzugs bzang ldan bud med //
T15TD4329E:111b-50: gang dang gang du 'gro gyur pa //
T15TD4329E:111b-51: de dang der ni dpal chen thob //
T15TD4329E:111b-52: rig par ldan dang rgyal po yi //
T15TD4329E:112a-0: @112a * // gang du'ang mnyam pa ma yin te //
T15TD4329E:112a-1: rgyal po rang gi yul na bkur //
T15TD4329E:112a-2: rigs ldan kun du bkur bar 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:112a-3: gzugs dang lang tsho phun tshogs shing //
T15TD4329E:112a-4: rigs mtho rnams las skyes gyur kyang //
T15TD4329E:112a-5: rgya skyegs shing gi me tog ltar //
T15TD4329E:112a-6: rigs dang bral na mdzes ma yin //
T15TD4329E:112a-7: lus can rigs dang bral gyur ba //
T15TD4329E:112a-8: rigs ldan yin yang ci zhig dgos //
T15TD4329E:112a-9: 'jig rten du ni rig pas mchog / rig pa med pas rlag par byed //
T15TD4329E:112a-10: bde ba 'dod na rig pa dor //
T15TD4329E:112a-11: rig pa 'dod na bde ba dor //
T15TD4329E:112a-13: rig pa don gnyer ga la bde //
T15TD4329E:112a-14: rigs dang mdza' bshes med gyur ba'i //
T15TD4329E:112a-15: mi ni rtag tu sdug bsngal 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:112a-16: rigs dang mdza' bshes ldan gyur ba'i //
T15TD4329E:112a-17: mis ni rtag tu dga' ba 'thob //
T15TD4329E:112a-18: rigs dang ldan pa gzhan yul gang //
T15TD4329E:112a-19: snyan par smar la pha rol su //
T15TD4329E:112a-20: gnas dang ldan pa khur lci gang //
T15TD4329E:112a-21: brtson dang ldan la thag ring ci ;
T15TD4329E:112a-22: / rtsol ba yi ni grogs yod la //
T15TD4329E:112a-23: ri rgyal rtse mo'ang mtho ba min //
T15TD4329E:112a-24: sa yi 'og kyang dma' ba min //
T15TD4329E:112a-25: rgya mtshos chod pa'ang pha rol min //
T15TD4329E:112a-26: rig pa glegs bam la bslabs kyi //
T15TD4329E:112a-27: bla ma'i thad rnams ma bslabs pa //
T15TD4329E:112a-28: 'phyon ma'i bud med sbrum ma bzhin //
T15TD4329E:112a-29: tshogs pa'i nang du mi mdzes so ;
T15TD4329E:112a-30: / bla ma gang zhig yi ge gcig / ster ba la ni brnyas byed pa //
T15TD4329E:112a-31: khyi yi skye gnas brgyar brgyud nas //
T15TD4329E:112a-32: rigs ngan du yang skye bar 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:112a-33: gang zhig la ni yi ge gcig / bla mas slob ma la byin na //
T15TD4329E:112a-34: gang zhig btang nas shog gtong ba'i //
T15TD4329E:112a-35: nor ni sa stengs yod ma yin //
T15TD4329E:112a-36: skyed par byed dang legs slob dang //
T15TD4329E:112a-37: gang zhig rig pa ster ba dang //
T15TD4329E:112a-38: zas ster ba dang mi 'jigs sbyin //
T15TD4329E:112a-39: lnga po 'di dag pha ru bshad //
T15TD4329E:112a-40: rgyal po blon po'i chung ma dang //
T15TD4329E:112a-41: de bzhin mdza' bo'i chung ma dang //
T15TD4329E:112a-42: spun zla'i chung ma ma nyid de //
T15TD4329E:112a-43: lnga po 'di dag ma ru bshad //
T15TD4329E:112a-44: blun po rnams la gdams pa ni //
T15TD4329E:112a-46: sbrul la 'o ma blud pa ni //
T15TD4329E:112a-48: mngon sum pa yi rkang gnyis phyugs //
T15TD4329E:112a-49: blun po yongs su spang bar bya //
T15TD4329E:112a-50: ma mthong tsher ma ji lta bar //
T15TD4329E:112a-51: tshig gi zug rngus gnod par byed //
T15TD4329E:112a-52: blun pos blun po mthong gyur na //
T15TD4329E:112b-0: tsan dan bas kyang bsil @112b bar byed //
T15TD4329E:112b-1: gal te mkhas pa mthong gyur na //
T15TD4329E:112b-2: pha gsod pa ni lta bur sems //
T15TD4329E:112b-3: skye bo ngan la phan pa dag / byas kyang gang la'ang byas mi gzo //
T15TD4329E:112b-4: dam pa cung zad bkur na yang //
T15TD4329E:112b-6: blun po chu yi ri mo ltar //
T15TD4329E:112b-7: gang zhig byas pa de myur 'jig / dam pa rdo yi ri mo ltar //
T15TD4329E:112b-8: shin tu chung du 'ang brtan par gnas //
T15TD4329E:112b-9: skye bo nang pa snyan smra yang //
T15TD4329E:112b-10: 'di la yid brtan rung ma yin //
T15TD4329E:112b-11: rma bya sgra snyan sgrogs na yang //
T15TD4329E:112b-12: zas su dug chen za ba yin //
T15TD4329E:112b-13: ae ma skye bo ngan pa dang //
T15TD4329E:112b-14: bad kan dag gi rang bzhin mtshungs //
T15TD4329E:112b-16: rtsub po yis ni zhi bar 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:112b-17: skye bo ngan dang gser dang rnga //
T15TD4329E:112b-18: mi srun rta dang bud med dregs //
T15TD4329E:112b-19: brdungs nas dul ba nyid 'gyur gyi //
T15TD4329E:112b-20: de dag legs byas snod ma yin //
T15TD4329E:112b-21: skye bo ngan dang lhan cig tu //
T15TD4329E:112b-22: dgrar gyur mdza' ba'ang mdzes ma yin //
T15TD4329E:112b-23: khyim ni rtse bar byed pa'am //
T15TD4329E:112b-24: lhag pa'ang mdzes par 'gyur ma yin //
T15TD4329E:112b-25: sprul bas kyang ni mi srun gdug / sbrul gdug sman dang sngags kyis zhi //
T15TD4329E:112b-26: mi srun cis kyang zhi mi byed //
T15TD4329E:112b-27: mi srun pa yi nyes pa ni //
T15TD4329E:112b-28: ngo bo nyid kyis rjes 'jug la //
T15TD4329E:112b-29: gang zhig mi srun dang 'dres de //
T15TD4329E:112b-30: mi srun las kyang mi srun 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:112b-31: pha yi spyod pa ma mthong yang //
T15TD4329E:112b-32: bu ni rjes su 'jug byed de //
T15TD4329E:112b-33: ke ta ka yi shid las ni //
T15TD4329E:112b-35: pha dang ma dang de bzhin spun //
T15TD4329E:112b-36: chung ma rjes mthun 'jug pa rnams //
T15TD4329E:112b-37: de yis sdig pa byas pa gang //
T15TD4329E:112b-38: de ni mi des byas dang mtshungs //
T15TD4329E:112b-39: sa 'di rgya mtsho chen po dang //
T15TD4329E:112b-40: ri bor bcas pa khur min gyi //
T15TD4329E:112b-41: gang zhig byas pa mi gzo ba //
T15TD4329E:112b-42: de ni shin tu khur lci yin //
T15TD4329E:112b-43: tshul khrims ldan dang lhan cig gnas //
T15TD4329E:112b-44: 'byung po kun la phan par dga' //
T15TD4329E:112b-45: gshin rje 'jigs byed gang yin pa //
T15TD4329E:112b-46: de ni mkhas pas rab tu bsngags //
T15TD4329E:112b-47: mkhas pa dang ni dul ba dang //
T15TD4329E:112b-48: chog shes bden smra lhan cig tu //
T15TD4329E:112b-49: btson rar gnas pa'ang gnas bla yi //
T15TD4329E:112b-50: mi srun nang gi rgyal srid min //
T15TD4329E:112b-51: dam pa dag dang lhan cig 'dris //
T15TD4329E:112b-52: mkhas dang lhan cig smra ba dang //
T15TD4329E:112b-53: brkam med lhan cig mdza' ba nyid //
T15TD4329E:112b-54: byed pa skyong bar mi 'gyur ro //
T15TD4329E:112b-55: shin tu yun ring dus su yang //
T15TD4329E:113a-2: gzhan du sdug bsngal mi 'thob pa'i //
T15TD4329E:113a-3: blo ni chos mthun nyid du bya //
T15TD4329E:113a-4: sems ni dga' bar byed na yang //
T15TD4329E:113a-5: rnam smin gnod byed ci ru rung //
T15TD4329E:113a-6: gang gis khams ni 'khrug byed pa'i //
T15TD4329E:113a-7: kha zas zhim po'ang ci ru rung //
T15TD4329E:113a-8: gnod kyang phan par 'gyur ba ni //
T15TD4329E:113a-9: mkhas pas sman bzhin btung bya ste //
T15TD4329E:113a-11: mtshungs pa med pa nyid du 'gyur //
T15TD4329E:113a-12: don 'dir rigs dang ldan pa yi //
T15TD4329E:113a-13: rgyal pos bsdu ba byas na ni //
T15TD4329E:113a-14: thog ma dbus dang tha ma ru //
T15TD4329E:113a-15: de ni gzhan du mi 'gyur ro //
T15TD4329E:113a-16: rgya mtsho 'jig pa'i dus su ni //
T15TD4329E:113a-17: gzhung las rgal bar 'gyur zhes grags //
T15TD4329E:113a-18: dam pa 'chi na'ang gzhung lugs las //
T15TD4329E:113a-19: nam yang 'da' bar mi byed do //
T15TD4329E:113a-20: lugs kyi bstan bcos shes rab sdong bu zhes bya ba /
T15TD4329E:113a-21: slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa las le'u gnyis pa logs shig tu bsgyur ba rdzogs so //
T15TD4329E:113a-22: lo ts'a ba sh'i len dra bo dhi dang /
T15TD4329E:113a-23: bande ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
